messages.body: Hi. We need a large order but want it split across multiple delivery dates.
We can do multiple shipments. What do you need?
KNM Coffee, Assam tea, copy paper, and Red Balloons.
Quantities?
12 bags coffee, 30 boxes tea, 50 reams paper, 3000 balloons.
Coffee $250, tea $360, paper $200, balloons $9k (3x1000). Total $9810.
Can we do three shipments? Coffee first, then tea and paper, then balloons.
Yes. When for shipment 1?
Nov 28 — 12 bags coffee only.
Shipment 2?
Dec 5 — 30 tea, 50 paper. Same address.
Shipment 3?
Dec 12 — 3000 balloons. Changi Hospital Wars 24 Singapore 700339.
Same address for all three?
Shipments 1 and 2 to 100 Finance Ave. Shipment 3 to Changi as above.
Noted. One SO, three DOs. Shipment 1: 12 bags coffee Nov 28, Finance Ave.
Net 30 from first or last delivery?
From last delivery — Dec 12.
Payment due Jan 11. I'll raise SO-2024-1300 with three DOs.
Balloons in 1000-per-box packaging?
Yes, 3 boxes of 1000. Tea 50 sachets/box, paper A4 80gsm.
Good. Any discount for the full order?
We can do 2% on orders above $9k — $9613.80.
Accepted.
Received. All three addresses are correct on the DOs?
Yes. DO1 and DO2 show Finance Ave; DO3 shows Changi.
Perfect. If we need to shift Dec 5 by a day, when's the cutoff?
Please confirm by Dec 2. We can move to Dec 6 if needed.
We'll keep Dec 5 unless something changes.
Understood. Anything else?
No. Thanks.
You're welcome. We'll confirm each delivery 48 hours ahead.
Good. Bye.
Bye.
Summary: 12 coffee Nov 28, 30 tea + 50 paper Dec 5, 3000 balloons Dec 12. Two addresses.
Yes. One order, three shipments, $9613.80 Net 30 from Dec 12.
Correct. Thanks again.
Anytime.
If shipment 1 is delayed, will it affect shipment 2 and 3 dates?
No. Each shipment is independent. We'll only adjust the affected date.
Good to know.
We'll send tracking or confirmation for each DO separately.
Please send to logistics@company.com as well.
We'll add that to the distribution list for the three DOs.
Thanks. Anything else we should confirm before Nov 28?
Just the receiving contact for each address. We have Finance Ave; please confirm Changi contact.
Changi: +65 8765 4321, ask for Stores.
Noted. We're set.
Good. Bye.
Bye.
